metadata.title: CVE-2022-43504 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Improper authentication vulnerability in WordPress versions prior to 6.0.3allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to obtain the email address of theuser who posted a blog using the WordPress Post by Email Feature. Thedeveloper also provides new patched releases for all versions since 3.7.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
